titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that any attempt at health care reform should ensure that patients have the right to choose their health care providers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
7/8/2009--Introduced. Expresses Congress's commitment to uphold a patient's right to choose his or her health care provider.
Recognizes that patient choice results in higher quality of care, lower costs, and more effective treatment outcomes.
